702950.name: FSX Steam Edition: McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II™ Add-On
702950.description:
The McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II™ from SimWorks Studios is the ultimate version of this iconic 1960s aircraft. This stunning aircraft add-on features both the B and N variants, two different versions of the cockpit, immersive and accurate flight dynamics. Every little detail on the aircraft model has been painstakingly reproduced - this package is an enthusiasts' dream!

Features


  • A high detail exterior model covering almost every McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II™ B and N variants to grace the skies. Including an McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II™ B variant which is representative of the early 1960s variant and various post 1968 variants.
  • Two different versions of the B variant cockpit, created with immersive detail.
  • The 17 included liveries have been carefully researched and created, with proper colour selection. Scratching and weathering is visible where needed on these used, but still 'factory fresh', aircraft.
  • Immersive and professional flight modelling: Feel the plane when doing high performance manoeuvres.
  • Hear the whine of the aircraft's engines as you spool them up and the air suction from the intakes with the included, authentic sound set.
